citations.narrative:
Fecal testing has not been performed on adult dogs in accordance with the schedule that was approved by the Attending
Veterinarian. Fecal testing for puppies has been performed in accordance with the Program of Veterinary care. Failure to
follow a written and Attending Veterinarian approved schedule for sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests
can lead to a delay in treatment for the animals in the facility. Correct by ensuring that sampling and treatment of
parasites and other pests in accordance with a schedule approved by the Attending Veterinarian is followed. Correct by
04-August-2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
Fecal testing has not been performed on adult dogs in accordance with the schedule that was approved by the Attending 
Veterinarian. Fecal testing for puppies has been performed in accordance with the Program of Veterinary care. Failure to 
follow a written and Attending Veterinarian approved schedule for sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests 
can lead to a delay in treatment for the animals in the facility. Correct by ensuring that sampling and treatment of 
parasites and other pests in accordance with a schedule approved by the Attending Veterinarian is followed. Correct by 
04-August-2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative. 
 
 n
